thread.title_full: Man U news: Ander Herrera parallel parks at Old Trafford | Daily Mail Online

author: Luke Augustus For Mailonline
title: Man U news: Ander Herrera parallel parks at Old Trafford | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 63 shares In the three-minute footage, Herrera is given a vintage Mini Cooper to drive which immeadiately poses a problem for him... as he usually drives an automatic. However, the engine of the Red Devils team was given a sterner task when he had to parallel park the vehichle in a tight space at an Old Trafford car park. Given 30 seconds to accomplish this, the Spaniard managed to achieve the feat in 25 seconds though. After arriving at Old Trafford, Herrera was given a parallel parking challenge in the car The 27-year-old had 30 seconds to park the Mini Cooper correctly in the space provided And the Spain international was a picture of delight after achieving the feat in 25 seconds The 27-year-old is enjoying his best season as a United player to date - having appeared 34 times in all competitions so far this season. United's No 21 played the full duration of their 2-1 win at Blackburn on Sunday as they reached the quarter-finals of the FA Cup. Herrera will miss United's next game at Saint Etienne in their Europa League second leg last-32 tie due to suspension on Wednesday. However, he is expected to return to their starting line-up when they face Southampton in the EFL Cup final at Wembley on Sunday. Herrera played the full duration of United's 2-1 FA Cup win at Blackburn on Sunday afternoon RELATED ARTICLES
